table.name: masked_input_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `masked_input_fields` ( `id` int(11) AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(250) NULL , `fieldname` varchar(250) NULL , `masked_input` varchar(11) NULL , `active` int(3) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

table.name: masked_inputs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `masked_inputs` ( `id` int(11) AUTO_INCREMENT , `masked_input` varchar(250) NULL , `alert` int(3) NULL , `alert_text` text NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));
